User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the CivisInsights AI application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user entity.

googleId.description: The unique Google ID associated with the user's Google account.

profilePicture.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

definition.description: Stores user profile data. Access is restricted to the user identified by {userId}.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to securely manage user data for the CivisInsights AI application, focusing on simplicity, security, and scalability. User data is stored under the `/users/{userId}` path, ensuring path-based ownership for private data. This approach guarantees authorization independence because access control is directly tied to the user's ID in the path, eliminating the need for `get()` calls to parent documents. This structure supports required QAPs by isolating user data and providing a clear path-based authorization model.
